Description:
Near New Home on approx 3.5 Acres
This magnificent approx 2 year old home is set on a quiet no through road on approximately 3.5 cleared acres, with a few mature gums for shade and character and is so energy efficient as it sports a 3.0KW solar system contracted at 68c per KW back to grid and offers it's lucky new owners 4 large bedrooms, two generous living areas, open plan kitchen/dining/family room, two bathrooms the main with a large spa, and a separate approx 6.5 x 12 meter garage with concrete floor, work bench and power. The master bedroom is tastefully appointed with a walk in robe and full ensuite, while 2 other bedrooms have built in robes. From the front door leading through each of the living areas is floating laminate flooring in a timber grain finish which is never too cold on little feet during the cooler months! The kitchen has a wonderful wide island bench with breakfast bar, gas cook top, electric oven, dish washer and features a red glass splashback. All clear windows throughout the home and the main living area and two rear bedrooms have been UV tinted and you will find a large reverse cycle air conditioner in the family room everything you need to be comfortable all year round. At the rear of the home you will be pleased to find a chook house, garden shed and a lovely paddock for a horse with a small dam. The property is on town water, and there is a water tank included just waiting to be installed! Properties like this do not come up every day, so be quick to inspect if you think this is the lifestyle for you!

Description:
Old State Savings Bank in Enviable Condition!
This incredible example of early goldfields architecture was built in the 1860's and still displays many of the original period features.
Featured in the 2003 movie starring Heath Ledger and Orlando Bloom, the Old State Bank was the pinnacle of the Bank Robbery scene, with the original Bank vault and counter on display. Both of these amazing historical features are yours to own today!
The building has been thoughtfully restored in keeping with the period, and on display in the upstairs formal lounge are the framed window signs, which were found in storage and also lovingly restored.
This incredible building has an entrance into the shop area as well as one into the residence, where you are greeted by stunning warm baltic floorboards which flow through the lower level - there you will also find the cosy country kitchen complete with original soul warming combustion stove; downstairs bedroom (currently used as additional shop space) and ornate staircase with cedar balustrade. In front of the staircase you will at once notice the tiny Alice in Wonderland door set high into the wall, which was once used to store sensitive bank documents away from prying eyes. You will find open fire places in the shop, office and bedroom
The stairs and upper two levels have been recently re-carpeted. Level 2 displays a bedroom, study and bathroom, while the upper level offers 3 bedrooms one with gas heater and another with air conditioning, walk in linen closet and the grand formal living and dining area.
A cellar is also attached to the kitchen downstairs, which is currently accessed externally, though once upon a time there was a door from the kitchen, although this has been bricked up at some stage. The original door from the kitchen is included and someone may want to restore this access point to it's original setting in the future!
The State Savings Bank was built during an era of grandeur fit for the prestigious position afforded a bank manager, and the older members of the community remember invitations to the grand balls held upstairs in the formal living area (then known as the ball room) being the most sought after in town!
Clunes itself is well known for it's Book Town weekend whereby thousands of visitors converge on the tiny town, as well as having been the backdrop for not only the 2003 Ned Kelly movie, but also Mad Max and Halifax FP. Included are photographs of Heath Ledger exiting the bank during filming of the Ned Kelly Movie and also a wonderful shot of the Clunes Main Street with the Bank in the background as it was during the movie set!
Book your inspection today to view this fascinating piece of Victorian Goldfields history!
- Set in Main Street of Clunes on 794m2
- Commercial Reverse Cycle A/C to Shop
- Original 1860's Bank Counter and Vault
- Zoned Business 1 with residence attached

Description:
Immaculate Home in Divine Clunes Setting!
Indroducing an immaculately presented 3 bedroom home in Clunes set on 1273m2 of beautifully landscaped terraced gardens overlooking the Clunes Creek, set high and dry on a block unaffected by the Clunes flooding.
As you walk through the front door of the period designed 3 year old home, you are greeted with stunning Mahogany coloured bamboo flooring which leads through to the open plan kitchen dining and living area. Here you will be blown away by the gorgeous designer kitchen featuring two drawer dishwasher, 600mm gas cooktop, electric oven, roll out pantry and again, the amazingly hard wearing bamboo flooring. The living/dining area features French door access to the merbou return verandah, an inverter split system heater/air conditioner large enough to cool or heat the whole home as well as a cleverly designed study and European laundry all hidden away inside a wall of cupboards you'll never have to put up with looking at an untidy study again!
The separate lounge situated at the front of the home and also offers french door access to the merbou return verandah which allows tons of natural light to flow through the room, as well as an additional split system and the most amazing outlook over the creek reserve you will feel totally secluded!
The well proportioned master bedroom offers an ultra modern ensuite complete with shower, toilet and vanity as well as a walk in robe with shelving and hanging space. Each of the 2 remaining bedrooms offer built in robes and are both double sized. The family bathroom features a designer free standing bath, clever cupboard space, toilet and glass shower screens. To complete the picture externally you will find a double carport as well as a single garage sporting power and a concrete floor, a 4500 lt water tank to water the wonderful garden, a 2700 lt tank plumbed to the toilets and landscaped gardens with a serene secluded secret garden for quiet time with the local wallabies! Add to this termite protected timber frame, concrete stumps, mains water and under floor insulation and you will find one of the most compelling properties in Clunes!

Description:
Large Building Allotment in Historic Clunes
This attractive 9960+m2 allotment is on a sealed road on the outskirts of Clunes town ship and has electricity available and town water on the front boundary of the property. It has a rustic country environment and is large enough to cater for a wide range of country pursuits. Just 20 minutes from Ballarat with easy access to the primary school, pub, post office and a wide variety of interesting shops and cafes in the historic and picturesque township of Clunes, this excellent block invites purchasers to create their own country lifestyle.

Description:
4 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom home on approx Acre!
Set in a delightful garden setting only a short stroll to the township of Historical Clunes, is this well presented 4 bedroom home plus study/sunroom.
This family home really has loads of features to offer it's new owners. All 4 bedrooms are spacious, three offer built in robes, the master bedroom features a walk in robe, brand new ensuite and split system, with the third bedroom also having an ensuite with toilet and shower. There is also another bathroom and a large laundry for the family.
The lounge room invites family enjoyment with free standing wood heater (ducted to other areas of the home), and plasma TV. A well planned kitchen that offers a balance of beauty, comfort and convenience with a dishwasher, bench space and big pantry. Dining area is beautifully tiled and offers a large area for formal entertaining. The home is also on solar power to help reduce the ever rising cost of electricity.
There is a generous decked entertainment area with views across the magnificent gardens and another paved area outside which would also be ideal for BBQ's as well as a fenced chook yard so you'll never run out of eggs again!
The property also features a 4 bay lock up garage with concrete floor and power and dual access to the property. This family home has everything you could possibly want, with the ultimate country lifestyle.

Description:
Former Clunes Butter Factory and Residence
Situated approx. 100 meters from the main street of Clunes, with the recreation reserve and swimming pool at your back doorstep is the former butter factory. The Old Butter Factory' has been converted into a residence and consists of 2 main buildings side by side. The residence features a brick exterior of 90m2 with concrete floor and an upstairs loft, large open space with timber lined ceiling and kitchen towards the front. The rear of the residence offers a laundry, bathroom, toilet and single car garage. This would be a great space for a gallery, home office or business subject to council approval.
Adjoining to the west boundary is a corrugated iron exterior open space, of approx. 90m2 with a timber floor. The land area is approx. 1200m2 with rear entry and well established gardens. Zoned township, this is an ideal opportunity to acquire a historic building that has many different options available, (STCA). Arrange your inspection today!

Description:
Clunes Country Retreat
Situated only minutes from the historic township of Clunes, this charming, well presented two bedroom dwelling offers the astute purchaser a near new home on approximately 1580m2 and presents open plan kitchen with electric cooking, lovely polished timber bench tops with breakfast bar adjoining the enormous family/dining area with solid fuel heater and storage cupboards. Off the main living area you will find the generous master bedroom with air conditioning and two way access to the bright and roomy modern bathroom. The second bedroom is also generously proportioned, as is the internal laundry. Delightful polished timber floors flow throughout the home giving it a warm country feel, and oh so easy to keep clean! As you move outside, you will find a huge shed, which could be used as a garage, or alternatively a studio as it is currently sectioned off into four rooms! This is limited only by your imagination! A dog run, chook yards, vegetable patches and a garden shed mean you really can live that sustainable lifestyle you have been dreaming of! Add to this package ramp access, low maintenance gardens, insulation well above standard and this is a home you can not afford to miss out on! Hurry to call for an inspection today!

Description:
11.04 Acres (Approx) Former Market Garden - Coveted South Clunes Location
Well positioned 1.5km South from the centre of the historic township of Clunes, and walking distance to the railway station this mainly cleared property represents a unique and affordable lifestyle opportunity. Featuring a sound hardi-plank home with surround veranda, consisting of 3 bedroom double bedrooms, an expansive well-appointed kitchen (modern electric appliances, dishwasher & two WIP's), with an equally generous adjoining formal lounge. All bedrooms feature robes (study nook, nursery or WIR to third) while the bathroom offers separate shower and bath. Outside there is a large tradesman's shed, (mains power and concrete floor) with skillion and adjoining office, ample with town water connected and 2 x 12,000 gallon tanks, and large surface dam. A number of sundry sheds aviaries' and raised bed garden complete the package. Call today for your inspection.

Description:
LOT 3 - UNINTERRUPTED VIEWS ACROSS CLUNES
This would arguably be one of the best building blocks in the historical township of Clunes.
Located opposite the local primary school and set high and dry is this substantial allotment with bitumen road frontage and all services such as power water and sewage to be connected upon completion of subdivision.
This would make an ideal home site with only a short stroll to town. Sporting ground , local swimming pool and supermarket Offering the land size of 8621m2 there would be ample room for the avid gardener to establish beautiful gardens, or it would make an ideal country retreat , surrounding yourself with space and magical views. Don't miss the opportunity to buy one of the best allotments in CLUNES with the best views.

Description:
Highly Productive Cropping/Grazing Opportunity Mt Beckworth
Comprising approximately 93ha (230 Acres) in 13 allotments, this rare offering has beautiful Mt Beckworth as a backdrop being ideal for farming pursuits combined with family camping trips. The property is approximately 90% cleared and has some 43ha of arable volcanic country with the balance including sandy river flats, sheltered areas with scattered timber, elevated rocky outcrops and frontage to the meandering Beckworth Creek. There are 7 paddocks of which 4 are well watered, 2 dams, power available and bitumen road frontage. Being 37 kms from Ballarat and 7 kms from Clunes in a tightly held and highly regarded area with multiple allotments this property will sell quickly. Don't miss your chance to buy quality with potential.

Description:
FANTASTIC FAMILY LIVING
Set in a quiet location is this perfect family home, offering plenty of space for the family.
Set on 3/4 of an acre makes this the perfect family lifestyle opportunity comprising 3 good size bedrooms, master bedroom with walk through robes and ensuite . Bright spacious lounge room with air conditioning , wood heating and portable gas heater.
Large open plan kitchen/dining with electric cooking and gas cooking,dishwasher and loads of bench and cupboard space.Big bathroom with shower over bath and toilet.Spacious laundry with heaps of cupboard space and electric hot water.
Further features outside include pergola with fernery , chook yard with shedding, dog yards, vege gardens , fruit trees , 2 carports , well fenced yard and front verandah to take in the beautiful well established gardens.
This would make a fabulous family home an inspection is highly recommended for those seeking the country lifestyle in the very popular location of Clunes.

Description:
Affordable Family Living
Looking for the perfect family home at an affordable price? This lovely family home, located close to the local primary school is the one you're looking for. Consisting of 3 bedrooms all with brand new carpet, combined kitchen/dining with pantry and electric cooking, lounge has floating timber floors and split system, bathroom with shower over bath and there is a spacious laundry. The home has also been freshly painted throughout.
There is a huge backyard with a garden shed and amble of room for all the family activities including room for a vegie garden or fruit trees if desired. There is decking at the front door, to sit and relax and take in the views.
This home is close to the centre of town and local primary school and with plenty of space, this home would be perfect for an investor or first home buyer!

Description:
Lovely Elevated Home
This beautiful solid brick home will surprise the purchaser with the size of its rooms and the lovely backyard.
It has 2 very large bedrooms with built-in robes, a long large living with big windows to take in the view of the front garden, with adjoining kitchen and dining. This home is designed with the idea of keeping the bedrooms separate to the living areas. The home has lots of storage space, and a alfresco area that you would be pleased to use in the upcoming summer months. Security doors, quality curtains and drapes with sun-blinds to the windows add to this well maintained home. The garage adjoins the house and is close to the main shopping area for convenience. Truly worth an inspection to appreciate its size!
